name: Epic Blocks for the Devtober 2021 Game Jam
name_original: Epic Blocks for the Devtober 2021 Game Jam
description:
Epic Blocks for the Devtober 2021 Game Jam is a game developed by Cats Studio. It came out on 03-10-2021.
Epic Blocks for the Devtober 2021 Game Jam is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
